Taxon.name: Measure.Current.AC.Sinewave

mtc:Parameter.name: UUT.Output
mtc:Parameter.mtc:Definition: Output Name of the UUT Connecting Point

Taxon.mtc:Definition: The process measures the AC Current sourced by a device without knowing the shape of the signal is a sinewave. Knowing the shape of the waveform allows the system to make conversions from RMS to PeakToPeak.
